content: brought to you by terms of use this is pattern is for personal use only you may not sell this pattern in part or in whole and derivative works are not permitted anything made from it may be sold for profit as long as credit is given to me as the designer you may contact me through the website listed in the medium weight 4 yarn i used bernat camouflage in blue frost h hook yarn needle single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet front double_crochet fdc back double_crochet bdc pattern © 2013 kim deister the crochet witch the crafty author all rights reserved http //thecraftyauthor kimdeister com chain 30 & join with slip_stitch to form circle row 1 chain 2 & double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in each chain around join with slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet 30 row 2-3 chain 2 & fdc around 1st double_crochet bdc around next double_crochet *fdc next bdc next* around join with sl st in 1st double_crochet 30 row 4-6 chain 2 & double_crochet in same st as joining double_crochet in each around join with slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet 30 row 7 chain 2 & double_crochet in same st as joining chain 1 skip 1 *double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip 1* repeat from * to * around joining with slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet 15 row 8 chain 1 & single_crochet in same st as joining chain 3 *single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3* repeat from * to * around joining with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 15 single_crochet row 9 chain 1 & slip_stitch to first chain 3 space chain 1 and single_crochet in same chain 3 space chain 5 *single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 5* around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet row 10 chain 1 & slip_stitch to first chain 5 space chain 1 and single_crochet in same space chain 5 *single_crochet in next chain 5 space chain 5* around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet and fasten_off weave in ends pattern © 2013 kim deister the crochet witch the crafty author all rights reserved http //thecraftyauthor kimdeister com
